jcr:content.jcr:title: United Kingdom in the Eurovision Song Contest 1960

contentheadline.headline: United Kingdom in the Eurovision Song Contest 1960

contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=December 2009}} {{ESC National Year | Year = 1960 | Country = United Kingdom | Preselection = [[A Song For Europe]] | Preselection date = 6 February 1960 | Entrant = [[Bryan Johnson (singer)|Bryan Johnson]] | Song = [[Looking High, High, High]] | Final result = 2nd, 25 points }} __NOTOC__ The United Kingdom held a national preselection to choose the song that would go to the [[Eurovision Song Contest 1960]]. The semi-finals were held on 2 February and 4 February 1960 and the final was held on 6 February 1960. All were presented by [[David Jacobs (disc jockey)|David Jacobs]]. ==Results== ===Semi-final 1=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Artist ! Song ! Place |- |[[Pearl Carr & Teddy Johnson]] |  |  |-bgcolor=#FFDEAD |[[David Hughes (singer)|David Hughes]] |Mi amor |  |- |[[Don Lang (musician)|Don Lang]] |  |  |- |[[Benny Lee]] |  |  |- |[[Lita Roza]] |  |  |-bgcolor=#FFDEAD |[[Malcolm Vaughan]] |Each Tomorrow |  |-bgcolor=#EFEFEF |colspan=3 |The table is ordered by appearance. |} ===Semi-final 2=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Artist ! Song ! Place |-bgcolor=#FFDEAD |[[Pearl Carr]] & [[Teddy Johnson]] |Pickin' Petals |2 |- |[[Ronnie Carroll]] |Spring, Summer, Autumn and Winter |4 |- |[[Vince Eager]] |Teenage Tears |6 |-bgcolor=#FFDEAD |[[Bryan Johnson (singer)|Bryan Johnson]] |Looking High, High, High |1 |-bgcolor=#FFDEAD |[[Marion Keene]] |Unexpectedly |3 |- |[[Denis Lotis]] |Love me a Little |5 |-bgcolor=#EFEFEF |colspan=3 |The table is ordered by appearance. |} ===Final=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Artist ! Song ! Place |- |[[Malcolm Vaughan]] |Each Tomorrow |4 |-bgcolor=FFDEAD |[[Bryan Johnson (singer)|Bryan Johnson]] |Looking High, High, High |1 |- |[[David Hughes (singer)|David Hughes]] |Mi Amor |2 |- |[[Pearl Carr]] & [[Teddy Johnson]] |Pickin' Petals |3 |- |[[Marion Keene]] |Unexpectedly |5 |-bgcolor=#EFEFEF |colspan=3 |The table is ordered by appearance. |} "Looking High, High, High" won the national final and went on to come 2nd in the Contest. {{UK in Eurovision}} {{Eurovision Song Contest 1960}} {{DEFAULTSORT:United Kingdom In The Eurovision Song Contest 1960}} [[Category:United Kingdom in the Eurovision Song Contest]] [[Category:1960 in the United Kingdom|Eurovision]] [[Category:Countries in the Eurovision Song Contest 1960]] [[Category:1960 in British music]]
